key.name: size
key.description: Playing field size. 1=Small, 2=Medium, 3=Large. Any other value is invalid.

key.name: ball-theme
key.description: Ball style. The filename of the images to use for the balls.

key.name: background-color
key.description: Background color. The hex specification of the background color.

key.name: score
key.description: Game score from last saved session.

key.name: field
key.description: Game field from last saved session.

key.name: preview
key.description: Game preview from last saved session.
